column2: Västerås Tolkiensällskap''' is the Swedish Tolkien Society of [[wikipedia:Västerås|Västerås]]. As of 2010
column3: the association seems to be inactive (the calendarium only shows events of 2008 and early 2009).

column1: Activities in Osgiliath is said to involve live role-playing
column3: studying the works and languages of [[J.R.R. Tolkien]]
